column4: Energy Spectrum Capital;;Yes;;Pinnacle Midstream II expands operations in gas-rich Midland Basin
column5: doubling processing capacity and aiming for commercial operation in Q4 2024. Also expanding facilities in Permian Basin to reduce flaring and maximize flow assurances. Supported by Energy Spectrum Capital.
